remarks: The restriction of a Cauchy sequence to an upper set of integers is Cauchy.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.)
statement:
caures.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
caures.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
caures.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( Met ` X ) ) $.
caures.5 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X ^pm CC ) ) $.
caures $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( Cau ` D ) <-> ( F |` Z ) e. ( Cau ` D ) ) ) $.
